mapper.insert: insert into FREEREPLY( bno, reply, replyId, replyPw) values ( #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyId}, #{replyPw})
mapper.select: select count(*) as total from FREEREPLY where bno = #{bno}
select count(*) as count from FREEREPLY where rno = #{rno} and replyPw = #{replyPw}
mapper.update: update FREEREPLY set reply = #{reply}, updateDate = now() where rno = #{rno}
